home.title: Welcome
home.text1: Agali Studios is a family business that started in 2025.
home.text2: It is located by the sea on the provincial road of Aidipsos-Lichada, just a few minutes by car from the port of Loutra Aidipsou or Agiokampos. In Loutra Aidipsou you can shop and go out for food and drinks.
home.text3: The property offers a total of 4 double apartments with balconies. They are all fully furnished and equipped with everything a guest needs for a pleasant stay. From the balcony, you can enjoy the sea view, while in our garden you can relax in the gazebo next to the olive trees.
home.cardSubtitle1: A paradise with turquoise waters and unique natural beauty.
home.cardSubtitle2: A natural retreat with golden sand and magical tranquility.
home.cardSubtitle3: Natural healing through the thermal springs of Evia.
home.cardSubtitle4: Enjoy the endless sea from your window.

accommodation.title: Our Studios
accommodation.text1: Our 28 sq.m. studios with a king-size bed are ideal for two people/couples. They are fully furnished and equipped with electrical appliances so you can have a comfortable stay and enjoy your vacation in our area.
accommodation.text2: Specifically, they have a refrigerator, cooking hobs, built-in oven, kettle, and toaster.
accommodation.text3: In addition, they are equipped with plates, glasses, cutlery, and basic cooking items that you can use during your stay with us.
accommodation.text4: Finally, all apartments have their own bathroom with shower, towels, and personal hygiene items.
accommodation.text5: The spacious balcony has chairs and a table so you can enjoy your breakfast with a view of the North Evian Gulf.
